explains: n. （动植物的）生活环境，栖息地
wordGroup: habitat destruction 生境破坏；毁坏栖息地

sentences.en: The panda's natural habitat is the bamboo forest.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫的天然栖息地是竹林。

sentences.en: In its natural habitat, the hibiscus will grow up to 25 ft.
sentences.cn: 在其野生环境中，木槿能长25英尺。

sentences.en: This species has nearly died out because its habitat is being destroyed.
sentences.cn: 因栖息地正受到破坏这一物种已濒于灭绝。
